short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds the varify.io script to your webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview Plugin for the Varify.io® Editor allows you to use Varify.io® for testing and demonstration purposes. Also you can allow the responsive device switcher, when it is blocked by your website.
